attributes.additional_details:
Release Royal Marine A, This is a travesty of justice, and HM Govt assisting the Enemy, which in this case is the Taliban, This is a Treasonous act, he should be released soonest, A Royal pardon for a Royal Marine.
The Government of the day should rescind this detention soonest.
If he were caught by the Taliban, you could guarantee that his murder would have been televised worldwide in the most horrific way, and what would our back stabbing, television sound bite Government done? absolutely nothing, shameful.
Do something good and righteous today, sign this petition, what have you got to lose? Nothing.
What has RM A got to lose? everything.
